mapper.select: SELECT id, role_name AS roleName FROM tb_role ORDER BY id
SELECT id, role_name AS roleName, permissions, `desc`, default_permissions AS defaultPermissions FROM tb_role WHERE id = #{id}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT r.id FROM tb_role r LEFT JOIN tb_user u ON JSON_CONTAINS ( u.role, CONVERT ( r.id, CHAR ) ) WHERE 1=1
AND r.role_name LIKE '%${roleName}%'
GROUP BY r.id ) AS temp
select u.id from tb_role as r join tb_user as u on JSON_CONTAINS(u.role, CONVERT(r.id, CHAR)) where r.id = #{id}
mapper.update: update tb_role set role_name = #{roleName}, `desc`= #{desc}, permissions=#{permissions} where id = #{id} and id!=0
